Rolling Dice with R Exploring Simulations in Games of Chance with R Gaston Sanchez November 2022 About In this manuscript I describe a couple of examples for implementing simulations of games of chance in R. About You I am assuming that you have some experience working with R. I’m also assuming that you have both R or RStudio installed in your computer. If this is not the case, you can take a look at Breaking the Ice with R https://www.gastonsanchez.com/R-ice-breaker Citation You can cite this work as: Sanchez, G.
